car.title: How much does a car loan cost?
car.description: Car loans are usually annuity loans. This means you pay a fixed sum every month for a pre-determined time.

toCalculatorButton.text: Check it out in the calculator

newCar.title: Loan for a brand new car

house.title: How much does a mortgage cost?
house.description: Discover how much a house loan will cost you and calculate when you can become debt-free. Our user-friendly website provides you with a realistic liquidity budget and end date for your debt.
house.p1: There are many factors that influence how much you can borrow and what the loan will cost you.
house.p2: On this page, you will find examples of the most common types of home loans.
house.p3: Choose the situation that best suits you and modify the rest in the calculator.

toCalculatorButton.text: Check it out in the calculator

housingAssociation.title: Loan for a home in a housing association

budget.title: How do I make a budget?
budget.description: We're working on the guide for budgeting. In the mean time, you should check out the calculator!

downloadBudget.1: Log into your DnB online bank
downloadBudget.5: Click the dropdown for selecting year
downloadBudget.6: Then select the previous year from the calendar

uploadBudget.disclaimer1: Your budget never leaves your computer
uploadBudget.disclaimer2: and this app will not remember the contents.
